content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Sure! Here is the Julia function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the Julia code blocks from the given markdown document.

```julia
using Markdown

function extract_julia_code(md)
    parsed = parse(md)
    code_blocks = String[]

    for element in parsed.content
        if isa(element, Markdown.Code) && element.lang == "julia"
            push!(code_blocks, element.code)
        end
    end

    return join(code_blocks, "\n")
end
```

This function first parses the markdown document using the `Markdown` package. Then, it iterates over each element in the parsed document and checks if it is a code block with the language specified as "julia". If it is, it adds the code from that block to an array. Finally, it joins all the code blocks together with a newline character and returns the resulting string.
